smsFormat.regex_Format: (?i)Your [[account]] A/c has been debited with INR [[amount]] on [[date]] at [[time]] and account [[to]] has been credited..*
(?i)Your [[account]] A/c has been credited with INR [[amount]] on [[date]] at [[time]] received from [[to]]. UPI Ref.*
